content: आवर्तक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [आवर्त एव स्वार्थे कन्] Revolving again and again. --कः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a form of cloud personified; जातं वंशे भुवनविदिते पुष्करावर्तकानां <ls>Me. 6</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 50.</ls> {@--2@} Depression above the eye-brows. {@--3@} A whirlpool. {@--4@} Revolution. {@--5@} Revolution of the mind from the influence of the senses. {@--6@} A curl of hair. {@--7@} A sort of poisonous insect. --की <ab>N.</ab> of a creeping plant.
